articles.title: Understanding School Board Composition and Parent Engagement
articles.summary: Learn about the Orange Unified School Board structure and how parents can effectively engage in education policy decisions.
articles.body:
## Understanding Your School Board

The Orange Unified School Board consists of seven elected trustees who make decisions about curriculum, spending, and education policy. Understanding how the board operates helps parents engage more effectively in their children's education.

### What Parents Should Know

Understanding school board decisions helps parents:

1. **Stay Informed** - Know what's being discussed and decided at board meetings
2. **Ask Questions** - Understand curriculum choices and

articles.title: A Parent's Guide to Your Rights in Orange Schools
articles.summary: Know your rights as a parent in the Orange school system. From curriculum access to board meeting participation, here's what you need to know.
articles.body:
## Your Voice Matters

As parents, we have both rights and responsibilities when it comes to our children's education. This guide helps you understand what you're entitled to and how to effectively advocate for your child.

### Curriculum Access

**You have the right to:**

- Review all curriculum materials used in your child's classroom
- Request detailed information about instructional methods
- Opt your child out of specific curriculum components (with proper notice)
- Access sample assignme

articles.title: Board Recap: Understanding the Latest Curriculum Changes
articles.summary: A comprehensive overview of the recent school board meeting and what new curriculum changes mean for Orange students and families.
articles.body:
## What Happened at the November Board Meeting

Last week's school board meeting addressed several important topics that will affect Orange students and families. Here's what you need to know.

### Curriculum Updates

The board approved several curriculum updates for the upcoming semester:

- **Math Program Enhancement**: New supplemental materials will be introduced in grades 3-5 to strengthen foundational math skills.
- **Reading Initiative**: A comprehensive literacy program focusing on phon
